description: Donor: (1) Chatham House; (2) Centre for European Reform

At the September 2013 Labour Party conference I spoke at a fringe meeting for Demos and was given hotel accommodation for one night, value £168. Address: Demos, 136 Tooley St, London, SE1 2TU Hours: 2 hrs. (Registered 10 October 2013)

At the September 2013 Labour Party conference I spoke at an early morning fringe meeting for the European Parliament S&D Group and was given hotel accommodation for one night, value £220. Address: S&D Group, European Parliament, Rue Wiertz, 1047 Brussels, Belgium. Hours: 2 hrs. (Registered 10 October 2013)

At the September 2012 Labour Party conference I spoke at two fringe meetings for the New Statesman and was given hotel accommodation for two nights, value £296. Address: New Statesman, 7th floor, John Carpenter House, 7 Carmelite St, London EC4Y 0AN. Hours: 3 hrs. (Registered 3 October 2012)

At the September 2011 Labour Party Conference I spoke at two fringe meetings for the thinktank Demos and was given hotel accommodation for two nights; value £132.  Address:  Demos, Third Floor, Magdalen House, 136 Tooley Street, London SE1 2TU.  Hours: 2 hrs. (Registered 28 September 2011)
